attributes.action: stop all UK foreign aid and invest this money in UK interests and to pay off UK debts
attributes.additional_details: The UK government should stop all foreign aid and invest this money in UK interests i.e.  building new affordable houses which would lead to jobs for young people and kick start the economy, investing in schools, hospitals, care for the elderly, paying off UK debt.  It is time for foreign governments to step up and look after their people.  It is time for the UK people who feel enough is enough our Government is NOT listening  when it comes to this issue.  Our young people need jobs and housing NOW before we start losing them to countries with better economies.     Our government should not be borrowing, they need to start repaying the countries debts.
